properties.title: Warehouse for NHL East of Canada

properties.description:
The factory of Sauveterre-la-Lémance is one of the oldest of Europe in the production of natural hydraulic lime today. Created in 1863 by Mister Rabot, (Rabot Lime still exist), it is nowadays one of the links indispensable to the development of SOCLI. Producer of natural hydraulic lime, this plant also makes catalog mortars and, other products of high professional skill, in the special formulations, as well as the road binders or the sands. Thanks to its blending station the plant can, thanks to its flexibility, propose very varied solutions of the customers.

Its quarries make an exceptional site, anchored in its territory and, which contributes to the economic development of the Valley of Lémance; this, in the respect for the sustainable development (in its environmental aspects and safety).

In an initiative of certification of the site in ISO 14001, the factory of Sauveterre is also proud of maintaining for several years its certification ISO 9001.
